- ssh   yum -y install glances
- vproxy.origin   set[ wpcloud.io > shanel.docker.uds.io:49154 ]
- vproxy.backend  set[ wpcloud.io > shanel.docker.uds.io:49154 ]
- vproxy.authenticate (Enable LDAP on request at Varnish level.)
- vproxy reload *
